on reading compounds: 随筆【ズイヒツ】essays, miscellaneous writings, literary jottings
随分【ズイブン】very, extremely, surprisingly, considerably, awfully, terribly, terrible, horrid, contemptible, reprehensible, remarkable, extraordinary
kun reading compounds: 従う【したがう】to obey (an order, law, etc.), to abide by (a rule, custom, etc.), to follow, to observe, to conform to, to yield to, to follow (a person), to accompany, to go with, to go alongside (e.g. a river), to follow (e.g. a sign), to serve (as), to engage in (work)
